name: Murderzone 3: Locked and Loaded
description:
A game made for the GBTK6 Jam with the theme "Oh no... I'm stuck!"

The game is played with the mouse. It also works on mobile! Make sure to play in landscape.

This was a collaborative game made possible by the following excellent individuals:

--Artwork--
benbolt504
TanukiWish
James
Bear
aryan jape
DragonQueen
Shrek_Chungus

--Music--
Jake Stevens
Anuman
James

--Game Design--
Shrek_Chungus
James
benbolt504
Bear
aryan jape
DragonQueen
Tommy Ettinger

--Special Thanks--
aryan jape, James, ScreamingFist, Anuman, Bear, benbolt504, crispycweed, DragonQueen, Jake Stevens, Groxar, HexRainbow, Ice2, kale, Kaleidostar, My dudette, Shrek_Chungus, TanukiWish, The_Humbugg, Zimtente, Tommy Ettinger

I couldn't have done it without your support!
